titleStmt.title: The copie of the letter sent from the commissioners of the G.A. to all the presbyteries shewing what course is to be taken by them, and every kirk session and family, for turning away the Lords wrath from the land.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

publicationStmt.publisher: For George Anderson, printer in Glasgow,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Mitchell Library, Glasgow (Scotland) Public Libraries.
